name: R1Soft
tag_list: cdp, continuous-data-protection, backup, data-backup, data-protection, disaster-recovery, backup-solution, web-hosting, hosting, service, recovery, software
overview:
R1Soft is the developer of Continuous Data ProtectionÂ® (CDP), scalable and high-performance disk-to-disk backup software for Windows, Linux, and virtual servers.

The company’s products include the CDP 3.0 line of backup solutions: Enterprise Edition, Advanced Edition, and Standard Edition. All three leverage R1Soft’s asynchronous replication technology to significantly shorten backup windows while reducing load on storage and alleviating the problem of disk I/O. The resulting virtual full backup replicas are fully portable and can be stored and archived on any disk-based storage, including network-attached storage (NAS) and second hard drives. For the Advanced and Enterprise Editions, a CDP add-on provides maximum protection for MySQL databases, including granular restore right down to the individual table level, without server interruptions.

R1Soft also offers free system admin tools for Windows and Linux. R1Soft Hot Copy, a universal disk snapshot utility for Linux servers, creates an instant point-in-time disk and volume snapshot of a Linux block device while the system is running, without interrupting applications. On the Windows side, R1Soft offers Hyper-V VHD Explorer, a tool for easy mount and dismount of Hyper-V Virtual Hard Disk (VHD) files. R1Softâ€™s free tools, as well as free product trials, are available for download via its website.

R1Soft was founded in 2006 and is a division of Idera, Inc.
